text: John, I had a rough week. My family's going through some tough times, and it's been hard to focus. My father was hospitalized after a heart attack, and the uncertainty of his condition is weighing heavily on me. I'm worried it might affect my interview at Innovatech.
I'm brushing up on my knowledge of Innovatech's product lines and their market strategies. Want to make sure I'm fully prepared.
John, I cannot go out for the dinner with you - I am very busy these days.
I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed with the Innovatech prep. Any tips on staying calm during interviews?
